website_summaries.verdict: Choose it if you have course, curly, or very frizzy hair and need a product specially formulated for your hair type. The quick-absorbing formula works for most, but it's not practical for straight, fine hair.
pros: Makes course hair soft and controls frizz
Pump bottle makes it easy to apply
cons: Not practical for all users, as its consistency has the tendency to feel heavy or oily on thin hair

customer_reviews.title: This serum is a good one to apply after you wash your hair with ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Wen conditioner for a long time now. My hair is much healthier than before. This serum is a good one to apply after you wash your hair with Wen and towel dry it. U wont even require to flat iron or blow dry. I leave my hair as is to dry on its own and the result is much soft and tamed hair... less frizz and lighter feeling hair. I would definitely recommend this product to people with dry damaged or color treated hair.
